name: Josh Rosenberg

jv_history.partner_name: Forward Thinkers - Unlock Your Growth Potential | Josh Rosenberg
jv_history.source_quote: Josh Rosenberg Managing Partner @ Forward Thinkers \| Certified

what_you_do: We talk with entrepreneurs and top business leaders to discuss how they are using AI to generate revenue and scale faster than ever.
who_you_serve: Our listeners range from tech-forward professionals to budding entrepreneurs, all eager to learn from your experience and explore new possibilities in AI.
seeking: To join the Smart AI Podcast as a guest, simply fill out our quick Guest Application Form.
offering: As a guest, you'll gain visibility with thousands of listeners, connect with new audiences, and position yourself as a thought leader in the AI space.
social_proof: With over 10,000 weekly listeners tuning in across every major podcast app, your voice and expertise will reach a wide and engaged audience, ready to learn from your journey.
business_focus: Simplifying AI for the masses by talking with entrepreneurs and business leaders about using AI to generate revenue and scale.
